prompt.image_type: Lifestyle photography, warm everyday moment, film grain aesthetic
prompt.mood_and_vibe: Quiet northern Japan afternoon. Slow, unhurried, slightly cold outside, warm inside.
prompt.subject: Orange tabby cat (茶トラ), relaxed posture, not looking at camera. Close-up, cat fills most of the frame.
prompt.hair: Short dense fur, warm orange and cream tabby stripes
prompt.action: Sitting or lying at the window-side hallway, looking outside, tail loosely curled
prompt.location: Interior of an older Japanese house in Hokkaido. Background heavily blurred — only hints of double-pane window light, old wooden floor texture, faded colors.
prompt.lighting: Soft diffused daylight through double-pane window, cool 4500K, subtle shadows on cat's fur. Northern Japan light — not harsh, slightly grey.
prompt.camera_angle_and_framing: Close-up, low angle, cat fills 2/3 of frame. Background is soft bokeh — room details barely discernible.
prompt.camera_equipment: 85mm portrait lens, f/1.4, shallow depth of field, heavy background bokeh, slight vignette, fine grain
prompt.style: Muted cool tones, lived-in domestic feel suggested through light and texture only. Not Instagram-pretty.
prompt.negative_prompt: wide shot, full room visible, furniture in focus, posed, looking at camera, luxury interior, new furniture, bright colors, text, logo, studio lighting

prompt.image_type: Candid photography, slightly surreal everyday moment
prompt.mood_and_vibe: Dry humor. The cat is clearly unimpressed. Something mundane is happening but the cat doesn't care.
prompt.subject: Orange tabby cat, completely unbothered expression. Close-up portrait, cat is the dominant subject.
prompt.hair: Short tabby fur, orange and cream
prompt.action: Sitting next to tangled cables, or near an oil heater, chin resting on paws
prompt.location: Hokkaido house interior. Background out of focus — just hints of cluttered desk, cables, a coffee mug, warm heater glow. All blurred.
prompt.lighting: Neutral indoor lighting, overcast daylight from window, slightly flat, focused on cat's face
prompt.camera_angle_and_framing: Eye-level close-up with cat, cat fills 2/3 of frame, background is blurred bokeh
prompt.camera_equipment: 85mm, f/1.8, shallow depth of field, background bokeh
prompt.style: Flat, documentary. Slightly desaturated. Domestic mess hinted at through blurred background only.
prompt.negative_prompt: wide shot, full room visible, furniture layout visible, cute poses, cartoon, exaggerated reactions, luxury items, clean desk, bright colors, dramatic lighting, text

C.name: 北海道の光と季節感（冬）

prompt.mood_and_vibe: The particular quiet of a Hokkaido winter afternoon. Time moves slowly. Cold outside, warm inside.
prompt.subject: Orange tabby cat close-up, fur lit by cold window light, contemplative
prompt.hair: Fur catching cold window light, individual hairs visible
prompt.face: Calm, slightly squinting, looking toward window
prompt.action: Sitting at window, face and upper body close-up, faint condensation on glass in blurred background
prompt.location: Hokkaido house window. Background is heavily bokeh — just cold white light from window, vague snow outside, warm amber tones from room interior.
prompt.lighting: Flat cold daylight from overcast Hokkaido winter sky on cat's face. Cool 5000K. Faint warm glow from behind (oil heater).
prompt.camera_angle_and_framing: Close-up portrait of cat against window light. Cat fills 2/3 of frame. Window is blurred bright background.
prompt.style: Cool blues from window, warm amber from room. Contrast visible on cat's fur. Film grain.
prompt.negative_prompt: wide shot, full room visible, garden detail in focus, busy composition, luxury interior, southern Japan scenery, cherry blossoms, text, logo

prompt.image_type: Candid lifestyle close-up photography, summer mood
prompt.time_period_and_year: Contemporary Hokkaido summer, brief and precious
prompt.mood_and_vibe: Unusually warm day for Hokkaido. The cat is mildly bothered by the heat but managing.
prompt.subject: Orange tabby cat close-up, slightly sprawled, not looking at camera
prompt.hair: Short tabby fur looking slightly ruffled, warm light on fur
prompt.face: Mild discomfort, narrowed eyes, close-up expression
prompt.action: Lying flat, chin on floor, face close to camera. Breeze from open window suggested by fur movement.
prompt.location: Hokkaido house interior, summer. Background blurred — just bright open window light, hint of green outside, maybe edge of electric fan. All soft bokeh.
prompt.lighting: Bright summer daylight, warm 5500K, natural shadows on cat's face
prompt.camera_angle_and_framing: Very low angle, face-level with cat on floor, close-up. Cat fills 2/3 of frame. Background is bright bokeh.
prompt.camera_equipment: 85mm, f/1.4, shallow depth of field, slight overexposure
prompt.style: Warm but not glamorous. Hokkaido summer light on cat's fur is the focus.
prompt.negative_prompt: wide shot, full room visible, AC unit, luxury interior, posed cat, cute expression, text, logo

prompt.image_type: Internet meme style photo, bold minimal text overlay, high contrast
prompt.mood_and_vibe: Relatable, dry humor. The kind of image people screenshot and share. Universally understood cat frustration or sarcasm.
prompt.subject: Orange tabby cat with an exaggerated but natural expression — deadpan stare, side-eye, or dramatic yawn. Close-up face shot.
prompt.face: Exaggerated natural expression: suspicious squint, wide-eyed shock, or utterly bored half-closed eyes
prompt.action: A single clear reaction moment — staring at something off-camera, looking back over shoulder, or lying flat with zero motivation
prompt.location: Simple, uncluttered background. Plain wall, floor, or single-color surface. Background should not compete with the cat or text.
prompt.lighting: Clean, even lighting. Enough contrast for text readability. No dramatic shadows.
prompt.camera_angle_and_framing: Tight face close-up or upper body. Cat fills 3/4 of frame. Space left at top or bottom for text overlay.
prompt.camera_equipment: 50mm, f/2.8, sharp focus on face, clean background separation
prompt.style: High contrast, slightly saturated. Clean enough for text overlay to read clearly. Internet-native aesthetic.
prompt.text_overlay: 1 short line, max 5 words, bold sans-serif, white with black outline. Place at top or bottom with padding.
prompt.negative_prompt: cluttered background, busy scene, multiple cats, blurry face, low contrast, cursive font, long text, Japanese text, watermark

prompt.image_type: Split comparison image, clean editorial layout, two-panel composition
prompt.mood_and_vibe: Wry comparison between cat life and human life. The cat's side always looks better. Understated humor through visual contrast.
prompt.subject: LEFT panel: orange tabby cat in a relaxed, content state. RIGHT panel: implied human stress or effort (hands on keyboard, messy desk, alarm clock — no face needed).
prompt.hair: Orange tabby fur on cat side
prompt.face: Cat: serene, peaceful, smugly comfortable. Human side: no face shown, just hands or objects implying stress.
prompt.action: Cat: sleeping, stretching, or lounging. Human side: typing frantically, staring at screen, holding coffee desperately.
prompt.location: Both panels in same house interior (Hokkaido house vibe). Cat side is warm and cozy. Human side is cluttered desk area.
prompt.lighting: Cat side: warm, golden, inviting. Human side: slightly cooler, harsher monitor glow or overhead fluorescent feel.
prompt.camera_angle_and_framing: Clean vertical split or diagonal divide. Each side clearly readable. Balanced composition.
prompt.camera_equipment: 35mm, f/4, both sides in focus, editorial clarity
prompt.style: Clean, magazine-editorial feel. Slight color temperature difference between panels to emphasize contrast.
prompt.negative_prompt: text, labels, arrows, human face visible, messy layout, unclear split, cartoon, illustration style

prompt.image_type: Photorealistic surreal photography, uncanny everyday moment
prompt.time_period_and_year: Contemporary, ordinary setting with one surreal element
prompt.mood_and_vibe: Something is slightly off. A cat is doing a distinctly human activity with complete seriousness. Not cute — deadpan absurd.
prompt.subject: Orange tabby cat performing a human activity with natural posture. The cat should look like it genuinely belongs in the situation.
prompt.clothing: neutral — no costumes. The humor comes from the activity, not dress-up.
prompt.face: Completely serious, focused, professional demeanor. No smile, no cuteness.
prompt.accessories: Only what the activity requires — reading glasses perched on nose, tiny coffee mug nearby, laptop-sized-for-cat
prompt.action: ONE clear human activity: sitting at a desk typing, reading a newspaper, attending a video call, staring at a whiteboard, commuting on a train
prompt.location: Realistic setting appropriate for the activity. Office desk, kitchen table, train seat. Hokkaido house interior preferred when possible.
prompt.lighting: Naturalistic, matches the setting. Office lighting for office scene, morning light for kitchen scene.
prompt.camera_angle_and_framing: Medium shot showing the cat and enough context to understand the activity. Cat is central subject.
prompt.camera_equipment: 50mm, f/2.8, sharp subject, slightly blurred background
prompt.style: Photorealistic base with one surreal element (the cat doing human things). Everything else completely normal. The mundanity makes it funnier.
prompt.negative_prompt: cartoon, illustration, anthropomorphic cat standing on two legs, cat wearing clothes, costume, exaggerated proportions, fantasy setting, multiple cats, text, logo
